name: unrestrainedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not limited or controlled : Libby put her head down on the table and cried unrestrainedly. She was unrestrainedly ambitious, cruel, and prone to screaming at her servants.
More examplesFewer examplesThe audience laughed unrestrainedly at the performer's every joke. We live in an unrestrainedly commercial era, when the amount of money spent on players is assumed to pay for success.In the first film that he both wrote and directed, he unrestrainedly turned the volume up.
